column6: I loved the print I purchased. However, they fit great right up to the point you bent over and the waist band rolls down an incredibly uncomfortable amount. Unfortunately they had to go back.
I own so many of these in multiple fabrics! Not my favorite to run in due to some sliding but great for yoga, cycle, errands, etc!

Print is beautiful and feel nice on the skin, but constantly had to pull waistband up. I’ve worn once and didn’t feel comfortable in my dance class. Definitely don’t think they would work well in yoga. I’m 5’3/140 and ordered a size 4.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Sher8,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear that the Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight *Nulux 28" is not performing for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 15, 2019'}

column5: Size '8' fits like a '12' - way too loose
column6: Depending on the brand, for me a size '8' is typically tight but flattering. Size '10' is roomy and nice when I want to feel comfortable. I figured an 8 would be ideal, considering the reviews of these as fitting looser. I got these for xmas and the reviews are no joke. They fit, way WAY too loose. They pool below the butt cheeks with simple movements. To me, these fit like an industry '12.' I'm not sure if it's the material, but Lulu got the sizing totally wrong with these. I've owned a variety of Lulu pants and tops over the years and these pants are totally a curveball... They are unusable because they are so big.

Though the floral print is absolutely lovely, I found myself pulling the waistband up too frequently for these to be functional, even for walking around. The distraction definitely didn’t give me the naked feel I was hoping for. I’m so disappointed— I’m a lulu size 10 all day, everyday, but these just kept falling down. Wish I could return :(

I’m obsessed with these. The only reason I gave 4 stars and not five is they do stretch out after starting to work out. Lulu exchanged for a smaller size after worn no questions asked. Amazing customer service. Bought all three colors and I’d get more if it was available.

I got these as a gift and expected the high-rise to be tight and uncomfortable. Wow was I wrong! Somehow, these tights stay put without feeling like they are squeezing you at all. They feel buttery-smooth, and move with you perfectly. The fabric doesn't get see through in squats, pigeon, or down dog, and I'm pretty muscular. These are now my favorite yoga pants. I only wish I had more than one pair!
Unless you have no cellulite and don't plan to walk or move skip this material. Thin, roomy, okay to size down, unforgiving. Same effect on the young girls that work at Lululemon as well.

These floral leggings are amazeballs, the colors are vibrant and fun. Way better than boring black. They fit like a glove and make your butt look like a field of fresh flowers. What more does one need than that?

They are definitely not worth the cost. I was concerned about the size but they stretch a ridiculous amount. As other reviewers said, they do not stay put. Some pros: extremely thin so feels like nothing is there and the print is divine even with stretch so there is not a lot of white background and the aesthetics remain intact. I wore them all day and then laugh a fitness class. It was a strength class which was okay but I would not wear these for my high intensity classes. They also give me the impression that the elasticity may not last but only time will tell.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey DGarvey,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight Nulux 28" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 15, 2018'}

column6: I LOVE the design. I love all things lulu. This is the 2nd pair of tights that I have purchased with Nulux material. I should have sized down bc my normal size is baggy w this material. Sadly I ripped off all the tags and ran in to a work out before I realized that poor fit. I need to stay away from Nulux. It's not for me. I LOVE THE DESIGN AND FEEL THO
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey PamelaRobo17,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight Nulux 28" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 15, 2018'}

column6: Absolutely love the feel of this tight and the fun floral pattern this season.

listen to the previous reviews! it's SUCH a bummer to say this because the print (ombre pink to deep burgundy floral magic) is absolutely beyond stunning and deserving of an extra star. because of that, i ordered the in my usual size despite the resounding "these don't stay up!!!" warnings echoed in numerous previous reviews. they arrived and felt like butter when i put them on. happily ripped off the tag and kid you not i didn't get from my apt door to the elevator before they started falling down. i was constantly pulling them up while teaching and showcased more of the top of my butt than i generally prefer while practicing later that evening. sizing down wouldn't have solved anything either, sadly think this is a total fabric/design flaw :( not worth it.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear JPPYOGA,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on the Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight Nulux 28". We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. Hang tight for an email coming your way! Chat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'December 13, 2018'}

column5: Will roll down, together with your undies :(
column6: I have a few pairs of lulu tight pants, this is the first pair that has disappointed me. I tend to wear my lulu stuff for a long time because they are expensive and truly durable. But this one, it rolls down all the time! One time, I was wearing the pants doing grocery shopping, they were rolling down constantly and together dragging my undies down. So awkward! I went to the bathroom and adjusted them and 5 minutes later, my undies rolled down under my butt cheek again.
column15: the waist part is not tight enough
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear Loverunning77,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your Wunder Under tight didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'December 9, 2018'}

column6: This is my third pair. Love them! Size down if in doubt. A little sweat prevents slippage. I am 5’6” 130# Size 4 is perfect!

This is the first pair of Lululemon pants I have ever bought and I love them. I mean, I told everyone how awesome they are. They keep me cool in the gym, they don't restrict movement at all, and they look amazing. As someone with an extra 15lbs around my middle, this is a great print to get because it fades to mostly black at the top creating a sort of slimming effect. Anyway, I would buy these again in a minute. And I might have to since I am losing weight and they are already getting loose.

A very close friend of mine,went a "over-the-top-" to gift these pants to me for my Birthday. She said these are,"Birthday,2018 and 2019". They roll down. I teach athletic fitness classes, and have to pull pants up, not a motivating move. She bought my size (4),as I wear mostly LuLu.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Wickedstepmother,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight *Nulux 28" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 5, 2018'}

column6: I’ve bought a lot of pants from Lulu but the “In Bloom” pattern is so see through I’m returning them. You could see my undergarments through the material, which is super disappointing because I love that print!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Runnergrl00,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight Nulux 28" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre (1.877.263.9300) or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. We look forward to speaking with you soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 5, 2018'}

column5: Love the print + lightweight material, but need much smaller sizes
column6:
I love the feel of this thin, breathable material and the print, but the material sags -- I would suggest sizing down 2 full sizes if possible.
I usually wear a 4 or 2, and I bought the 2 at my store. As soon as I started practicing yoga in them, they started sagging and would not stay up. No 0 offered, so there's really no option for me.
I would not recommend them.
I agree with a previous reviewer -- make these in the fast & free because those definitely stay up.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Lmm2,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on the Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight Nulux 28". We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. We’d like to get to the bottom of this and work towards a resolution, so I\'ve sent you an email to follow up.', 'LL_response_date': 'December 4, 2018'}

column6: I loved the print of these leggings...so beautiful! But so disappointed in the fit. I bought the size I normally wear in Lululemon and put them on when I got home. They would not stay up even just walking around the house. I found myself constantly pulling them up. So I loved them enough that I returned them and got a size smaller...still would not stay up. The fabric is just too thin and slippery. They might have been ok had they put a drawstring in them but alas they did not. I thought about taking them to the tailor and having one added but for $128 I feel they should fit a lot better without having to pay for alterations. Looking at the reviews, I see that I am not the only one that has had this fit be a problem.
The pant feel light and fit great when wearing it but it keeps rolling down for some reason, and I had to keep pulling it up . Disappointed for the price I paid and its function.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear TTNG,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight Nulux 28". We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. We’d like to get to the bottom of this and work towards a resolution, so I\'ve sent you an email to follow up.', 'LL_response_date': 'November 28, 2018'}

column6: I was so excited to have a high rise pant made with Nulux, as the fast and free are my very favorite! I received these as requested for my birthday because I loved the black and white pattern, but was was so disappointed. I was pulling them up constantly throughout my yoga class, the waistband kept folding down, they were looser than my usual despite them being the size I always get, and I realized they were nearly see-through. Also, I found a snag on the front right thigh, despite being my first time wearing them. For the money, I am very upset and will not be purchasing again
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi yogimk,\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution. Check your inbox for an email headed your way.", 'LL_response_date': 'November 25, 2018'}

column6: I love the In bloom and Flowerescent prints. They are really beautiful. Lulu please make these prints in the Fast and Free, In Movement or some other legging that actually stays on when you move. The Wunder Under in Nulux falls down to my knees after two sun sals, so you won't catch me buying them again.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Formerlulufan,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'November 20, 2018'}

column6: I quickly ordered another pair of these after I wore my black ones twice and didn't want to wait for laundry day. The problem I'm having is the ankles have already started to fray on both pairs after less than two weeks of wear. I wash on gentle and don't put these in the dryer. I'm probably not going to buy from lululemon again because of the price- I feel silly for spending more than $100 on something that started to fall apart after two weeks.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey jaynay,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us! We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I'll be reaching out shortly to connect.", 'LL_response_date': 'October 25, 2018'}

column6: I have about a dozen Lulu pants and have loved them all until now. These looked so cute, and I thought I got a great deal on the price. Unfortunately, they slide off when trying to do even minimal activity. The fabric is soft and comfortable, but absolutely NOT worth the $79 (sale price) I paid. I bought two pairs and they were final sale, so I am SOL. Don't Buy!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear VSDDA,\nOh no, we’re sorry to hear your gear isn't performing as expected—we can understand the disappointment. We'd love to chat with you further to gather more information from you and work towards a resolution. We'll be reaching out via email, so keep your eyes peeled on your inbox. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'September 19, 2018'}

column6: I really wanted to love these pants. I love them when I am not doing any walking around, but i am unable to workout in them because I keep having to pull them up every 5 seconds. I really love lulu pants, but these ones just are too much of a hassle. I would definitely recommend not buying these, but buying another pair from lulu.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'DearJessJess16,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'d love to hear more of your experience with your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight Nulux 28". Keep an eye out for an email coming your way!', 'LL_response_date': 'September 6, 2018'}

column6: I loved the bright colors in these pants. However, they felt more like a thin pair of panty hose instead of workout pants. For the money, they should be thicker. Plus, they seem to stretch endlessly. I think they need to make them thicker and more like compression tights. I had no choice, but to return them.

I was so excited to receive these pants in the mail, but after a few wears the seams on the inner legs were beginning to unravel, the color was coming off on my legs when I would get sweaty during a workout, and I would constantly have to pull them up. I am extremely disappointed, considering that I own plenty other pairs of leggings from Lululemon and none of the others seem to have this problem. If I could put zero stars I would. I do not plan on ordering from this store again after this pair.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi HanG,\nThanks for taking the time to connect with us. Oh no! I'm sorry to hear that your gear has not performed as intended. We'd love to help turn this around, so we've sent an email your way outlining a few solutions.", 'LL_response_date': 'September 3, 2018'}

column5: When you need a "pick me up"
column6: I of course bought these because of the Nulux fabric. Saw them online and did not regret. I use them for yoga and light weight training.

The rainbow-floral spectrum print is cray and the main reason I’m leaving this legging a good review. If it weren’t for the fun design, I’d have gotten over these already.
...
I flat-out love being in these leggings, they’re stunning and exceptionally comfortable. Also, they don’t feel yucky after a sweaty workout, which is always a sign of a high-quality legging.
...
They only get 4 stars because I’m of the personal philosophy that $100+ leggings should last 2+ years... I’m not convinced these are gonna have a long life. I gently hand wash and lay flat to dry and even after a couple weeks of regular dance, pilates, strength training, there’s wear and tear along the inner seams and upper thigh :(
...
I probably won’t buy these again but I’ll look fresh for now.

I was extremely excited for these and very let down when I did receive them. The material itself is very comfortable but not true to size — when I try to do any kind of activity in them, they are constantly falling so I feel like all I do is yank them back up.I Wish is was able to actually wear them for my activities not just try them on for 5 minutes in store and then decided to buy them. Lululemon should hold in store classes where you try the product before you buy. The quality wasn’t great as they stretch out and these were a gift from my partner

I don't LOVE Nulux but you can't get cool prints in Luon so I guess it's worth the extra tugging. Once you get sweaty they stay in place. I am glad I bought them. They run big so size down. Not sure why they come at a premium to Luon but I LOVE the print.

As always with Lululemon the quality of construction and durability are great. These really are tights, not leggings/pants. The material is very thin. The only drawback is the waist, which is big so the pants slip down and need to be hiked up regularly

I love wunder under. I love them in luxtreme but you didn't have 10s in so because I love nulux for other pants I coughed up 128 bucks for wunder unders and these things do not stay up. They slide down terribly. I am pulling them up every few minutes just walking around the house. I plan to exchange them.
LOVE the print on these. Fit good. I wear between a 2-4 on the bottom and I chose the 4 and really I could have gone either way. I will keep the 4

Love the fit and the feel. Wasn’t sure about this fabric when it first came out, now I’m a fan!! Breathable and flexible. They also stay put. I can wear a 6-10 depending on the year lol. I could probably do one size down. But I’m keeping these

I was extremely excited for these and very let down when I did receive them. The material itself is very comfortable but not true to size — when I try to do any kind of activity in them, they are constantly falling so I feel like all I do is yank them back up.
Wish is was able to love them but they just don’t fit at all.
column15: way too big / not true to size
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi SF496,\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. We want your gear to support your sweatiest pursuits, but it sounds this isn’t the case for you. We'll be following up via email to discuss this further. Speak soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'August 22, 2018'}

column6: I LOVE these pants. They’re by far my favorite to workout in. Light, breathable and move with me. I need them in every color.

I have multiple pairs of Lulu Lemon leggings that I love. I decided to splurge a little and get the more expensive pair. Assuming they would be even better than the $98 pairs I have bought before. I was completely wrong. These leggings don't even stay up for two minutes without sliding down. Making them not only uncomfortable to wear, but extremely unflattering. I have tried to wear them on three occasions and regretted each time. They will continue to hang in my closet being a waste of over one hundred dollars. I regret this purchase and highly suggest to anyone thinking of buying them to save your money. Try another style and fabric because Lulu Lemon severely missed the mark with these pants.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey TerriP90,\nI\'m so sorry to hear of your experience with the stretching and wearing of your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight *Nulux 28". I completely understand why you\'re disappointed with this and I\'d love to help turn this around. We fully stand behind the quality of our gear, so I\'m going to follow this up with an email that outlines how to move towards a resolution.', 'LL_response_date': 'August 15, 2018'}

column6:
My boyfriend bought me these, and I kept really good care of them. But they are piling so badly!!!!!!!! I have stopped wearing them so I don't get a hole in them. I also have a pair that are the grey and black, they do the same thing.
Waste of money on both pairs. I know there is something wrong with these since my capris have not done this to me.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Lunabear,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'re sorry to hear that you\'ve experienced pilling with your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight *Nulux 28". We would love to discuss your concerns further. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'August 1, 2018'}

column5: Not what you'd expect from Lululemon
column6: I am a frequent shopper when it comes to Lululemon. I was excited to get new workout pants, thought these seemed comfortable. Now I never wear them. They don't stay up, they attract so much hair and dust. They truly do look terrible and are only worn when I am laying around the house. Really disappointed. Maybe you could lower the prices on these?
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi LULUGYMIRL101,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are sorry to hear that your leggings are not performing for you, and we would love to help. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 29, 2018'}

column6: I recently bought two pairs in the store because I was so floored by the initial fit and feel of these pants! During the first wear they looked great, I wore them to the grocery store and then to my studio for a spin class. When I came home I immediately noticed pilling on the bottoms and in between my thighs. I was warned these may pill after some serious wear and high intensity workouts, but not after the first wear. Though I think this pant is very flattering I am extremely disappointed in how quickly they become unwearable outside of the house.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear loveandlift,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'re sorry to hear that you\'ve experienced pilling with your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight *Nulux 28". We would love to discuss your concerns further. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 24, 2018'}

column6: I was so excited to get my first pair of pant from Lululemon, yet ended up the worst $120 I've ever spent. The first day I wore them were great, comfortable and cute. Yet after the first wear and wash, the seams by the thigh has a hole. Disappointed.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey DANCINGNINJA,\n\nThanks for taking the time to pass along some feedback on the Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight Nulux 28". I\'m sorry to hear that a hole has appeared in your leggings. Keep an eye out for an email headed your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 15, 2018'}

column6: These looked cute when I tried them on in the store, however when I wore them to actually work out, I had to pull them up every 2 seconds. This happens even when I am just wearing them around the house. Also, within 2 weeks after buying these, they already started to get holes in the knees.

column5: The worst pair of lulu pants I've owned...
column6: I bought these pants to wear as an every day pant. I did read the reviews before I bought them. Most of the reviews said the pants would stretch out and people had to pull them up. I assumed that would happen over time, like most pants. But it happened like the first time I wore them. For $128 I feel like I got quality of $5 pants.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight *Nulux 28".\nI\'m sorry to hear of the retention loss that you\'re experiencing on your pants and can understand why you\'re not pleased. I\'d love to lend a hand and help with some options, so I\'ve sent an email to you outlining the next steps.', 'LL_response_date': 'July 6, 2018'}

column6: Loved Lululemon pants before but this time they are just truly awful. I wore them a few times and now they are stretched out and just look terrible. Not making me look good anymore. My other like $20 yoga pants hold up better than these do
column19:
{'LL_response_content': "Dear britswan,

We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.

We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution.

We have sent you an email outlining a few options.", 'LL_response_date': 'May 8, 2018'}

column5: single worst product I've ever purchased from Lululemon
column6: ok. so I guess I have learned my lesson from not reading a review before buying. These lovely. Feel wonderful but they do not stay put. Thankfully I didn't wear them on a run or a workout because I would've probably not been wearing pants within about 5 minutes. They fall down constantly. They do not stay up. Just wearing them to the store I felt like I could only doing things with one hand because I was continuously pulling them back up and keeping them from falling down. I wear a size 8 in all pants and these do not bounce back. Wearing them for 5 minutes them started falling down. The biggest disappointment ever. really?
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey spunkyasiangal,\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight *Nulux 28" haven\'t held up as expected and I completely understand your disappointment. We\'d love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way.', 'LL_response_date': 'April 13, 2018'}

column6: I bought these in my regular size for this style, however, I am spending far too much time having to pull them up. That's a lot of money for a pair of tights I am not comfortable wearing. :-(
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Linnieruns,\nThank you for taking the time to connect with us. Nobody likes when their pants stretch out, and making things right for you is our priority. Keep an eye on your inbox—I'm sending you an email to chat more.", 'LL_response_date': 'April 4, 2018'}

column5: Coolest pants... until you get home
column6: I was beyond excited when I saw these pants in my local store. The black and white pattern matches my style perfectly. I was hesitant when I saw the price though-- and I should have went with my gut. These pants will not stay up. I cannot even wear them comfortably because I am constantly pulling them up. I purchased them in an 8, my usual size, and this problem is so prominent I can't even wear them. Very sad. Love the texture and pattern.

At first, I regretted buying these tights. I loved the pattern, but I had issues with them sliding down the first time that I wore these tights to yoga. The texture of the Nulux against the texture of Namastay put hipster underwear was just far too slick. Going forward, I have worn these with the Namastay put thong and have been SO happy. These pants are so comfortable and stay put during my vigorous vinyasa and power yoga classes, while also keeping me cool. I sweat a lot and tend to prefer Luxtreme tights over most fabrics, but I have found that the Nulux wicks away sweat faster. I am not clammy under the waistband after an hour and 15 minutes of a very sweaty practice. I just wish these weren't $128, because I need more pairs.

I ordered these because the price seemed pretty justifiable-- and I should have paid attention to the reviews. I absolutely love the pattern of the ones I got-- they have the lace with the flower detail. At first they were great to wear, but then as I was walking out of the house I noticed they became a little bit more roomier and by the time I started working out --- they were extremely baggy. I was pulling them up every second I had a chance. This disappoints me, I love lululemon, and I order to our APO address-- so returns are hard for me to do. I wish these were returnable, but I guess they will be lounging around the house leggings =( The length was perfect.. they feel amazing, I love the pattern.. but they fall down. Maybe I should have gone down in size?
column19:
{'LL_response_content': "Dear Kimberly,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear your pants have lost their fit!. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!

Thanks,
Mark", 'LL_response_date': 'March 18, 2018'}

column5: These pants fail to meet expectations
column6: I just returned these pants. Even though the print is beautiful, the quality of the fabric feels below what I expect from Lulu. They are thin with little to know structure. I didn't try to practice or exercise in them but I could easily see them sliding down like the other reviewers have experienced. Definitely not worth the price. :(

I bought these in the store. I have been so excited never bought lulu before but my sister swear by them. They gave me a gift certificate and I got these. The next day I took my puppy and four toddlers out thinking I would be fine and as I was walking across the parking lot hands full they started to slide down all the way below my shirt line before I go to a safe place to pull them up. Love the print but the falling off pretty much makes them unwearable
column19:
{'LL_response_content': "Dear Stujaim,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm so sorry to hear the fit of these pants was not good for you. I'd like to help you out on this one! Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!

Thanks,
Mark", 'LL_response_date': 'March 18, 2018'}

column6: Super bummed because I lalalove the pattern of the leggings. I ordered my usual size 4 and they were so loose that they were basically falling off. SIZE down, maybe even 2 sizes.... I can't even wear them for yoga because I'm constantly pulling them up. Sad :(

column5: The Elastic Stretched Out on First Wear
column6: I own several pairs of Wunder Unders in Size 4, and I love every single one of them... except for this one. When I tried them on in the store, they fit perfect and the design is super cute. But as soon as I wore them at home, they stretched out immediately. I am having to pull them up constantly because they are baggy around my crotch and thighs. I plan to return these to the store ASAP. They are not worth $128 at all.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Sarah88,\nI'm sorry to hear that your gear has stretched out and I'd love to help you find a solution. Keep an eye on your inbox for an email I've sent your way!", 'LL_response_date': 'February 26, 2018'}

column5: Stick to Luon or Luxtreme for Wonder Unders!!
column6:
I bought a pair of Wonder Unders in this Nulux fabric because I LOVED the print (a cool splattered ombre!).
I only wear Wonder Unders and have 10+ pairs of them. But this fabric is too stretchy I think. The pants are constantly falling down, whether I'm hiking, walking, or doing yoga, I'm CONSTANTLY pulling them up. These are not the most functional exercise pants, as you will be distracted by them falling down the entire time you move in them. Definitely stick to the regular Luon or Luxtreme for these pants, especially because the Nulux is more expensive than the other options.
I see other people have this problem, I wish I had read the reviews before purchasing!!!
Do not buy unless you don't mind your pants falling down.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Kelstar10,\nThanks for taking your time to share this feedback. I'm sorry to hear that your gear is not performing for you and I'd love to help you find a fix. I've sent an email your way so we can get the ball rolling on a resolution.", 'LL_response_date': 'February 26, 2018'}

column6: I ordered these from the store since I needed to size down. Little did I know the reviews would have explained- they run super large, and YES THEY DO FALL DOWN! Come on Lulu... I have many pairs of Wunder Unders and why do these run so big and don’t stay up. So disappointing since I am not comfortable wearing in practice. As an instructor I need to feel comfortable in front of my students in what I wear and I can not teach in these pants since I am constantly pulling them up. To make matters worse they are much more expensive than the other Wunder Unders I own.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear Crair,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I understand how distracting it can be when you're having to adjust your gear during your practice. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'February 20, 2018'}

column6: I wish I took the time to read the reviews on this pant. I’ve worn these pants twice and will never wear them again. Which is sad because I love the print, but I can’t keep pulling them up ever few steps I take. Disappointed how much they were and I can’t wear them.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi HFlan,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I can certainly understand your disappointment with your pants. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 20, 2018'}

column5: Constantly having to pull these up
column6: It is so frustrating that these leggings do not stay on your hips! Completely agree with the others who say that these do not stay on even when purchased in a correct size. So disappointing they are even more $ than typical Lulu leggings. I continued wearing them to work out b/c I loved the pattern but its seriously not worth it having to pull them up every step I take.

I wore these on a run today and I literally thought they would be down on my ankles by the end. Had to constantly stop and pull them up. So frustrating. Definitely a bad buy and a bad quality item from Lulu. Don't bother with these - NOT worth the price.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Wolfegirl,\nI'm sorry to hear your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight is slipping down. I’ve sent you an email to follow up so we can continue the conversation — chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'January 29, 2018'}

column6: I love lululemon tights! However this is my first pair in the Nulux fabric. I loved the feeling of the fabric at first. It was soft and lightweight, almost like second skin. But my disappointment came with the first wear of them.The very first day I had to pull them up all the time! I'm glad I had a longer shirt that covered my behind. Otherwise everything would be showing. I loved the fact that they were high waisted. However, there is no point of the high waist since they fail to stay up. I cannot really match them with shorter shirt given these conditions. I really wish they would be more compressed at the waist line, thus eliminating this bothersome problem.
column15: quality of waist elastic - they don't stay up

column5: What good are pants that don't stay up??
column6: Wish I had read the reviews before I purchased these pants!! I was so excited when I put them on - they fit like a glove. Took the tags off and brought my dog out for a walk, a 15 minute sniffy walk, no strenuous activity. The pants kept falling down both at the waist and the crotch. So irritating to have to keep unzipping my coat in 15 degree weather to pull up my pants. Contacted the "Education Centre" only to be told that my only option was to return for a gift card since they had been worn and the tags taken off. Not acceptable to me - am I supposed to wear with tags all day in anticipation of an issue? Asked to speak to a supervisor but there are none to be had at the "Education Centre". Bad pants, bad customer service. Lulu has likely lost me as a customer. Too many other options out there.

I am a true size 6 in ALLLL my 30+ pairs of Lulu leggings I own. I ordered these because the print is GORGEOUS. They look amazing. They feel amazing....but they just don't stay up. Like at all. I pulled and squatted over and over and over again ...and when I didn't pull them up, they just fell down to cause that space between your actual crotch and the crotch of the pants...and that is inches wide when I don't pull them up. I should have sized down. I LOVE LOVE LOVE Nulux (have every Fast Free legging that has come out)...but something about this cut makes them not stay up. Sad face!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey bossyjones,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts today. We hear your disappointment and will be sending an email your way to follow up and lend a helping hand.\nSpeak soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'January 26, 2018'}

column6: I am a long time fan of Lululemon. I bought these in August because I thought the print was so gorgeous. I triethm on but did not try to actually try to wear them until December (Florida weather!) but they will not stay up! You have to constantly pull them up.... very disappointing! Would definitely not recommend these.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey ChrisCritt,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts with us today. We stand behind the quality of our gear and will be following up with some solutions via email.', 'LL_response_date': 'January 21, 2018'}

column6: When I tried these on at the store, I was SO excited. Literally the most comfortable pants I had ever tried on. The next day, I wore them out and about and by the second hour they were falling off. They stretched out so completely that I can't even walk to the car wearing these without pulling them up constantly. Very disappointing, considering they fit like a glove when I tried them on in store.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey MEFP,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts with us today. We stand behind the quality of our gear and will be following up with some solutions via email.', 'LL_response_date': 'January 19, 2018'}

column5: :( I was drawn in by the print, disappointed by the quality
column6: Iʻve been a Lulu fan for the last seven years. My absolute favorite pant is the Wunder Under, size 6. My last two purchases - one in the Nulux and one in Luxtreme have been so utterly disappointing. My WU tight in the Nulux stretched out after the second wear. I try to get one more use out of my workout pant when I do something not so sweaty (Candlelight Yoga). I washed like usual (gentle cycle cold and hang dry) and when I put the Nulux on again, it was still stretched out. I didnʻt think lightweight coverage would mean lose shape after one wear. I love the print so much, totally unique. I never hesitate to size up and down either, but I was uncomfortable in the 4. I received my Luxtreme pair for Christmas - itʻs also a tight and I can barely pull the leg up my calves. Itʻs also a size 6. I have no problem sizing up to an 8, but I have to go into the store to do it and the print will likely no longer be available. Iʻm starting to wonder why Iʻm so loyal to this brand :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey mar824,\nThanks for connecting with us. I'm so sorry to hear your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight is not holding up for you. We stand by the quality of our gear and want to make sure it's performing well for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way with some solutions", 'LL_response_date': 'January 17, 2018'}

column6: I have never been more frustrated with a pair of pants. I wore these walking my dogs and was pulling them up the ENTIRE time. I've had pants where the waistband slips, but these the waistband slipped, and the actual legs at the bottom bunched up b/c they would get so low. Literally it felt like they could have slid all the way to my knees if I didn't pull them up. By the end of the walk, I couldn't wait to get home to get out of them! Only reason I'm giving them 2 stars is for the cute print.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey LoCro,\nWe hear your disappointment with the retention loss on your gear and would like to chat some more. An email is coming your way so we can follow up and help.\nChat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'January 3, 2018'}

column6: I have never had leggings fall down! I tried these on in-store in my usual size - 6. They were very loose at the waist so I sized down and tried on the 4. The 4 fit better and felt great! I wore them for the first time today to the gym. Didn't do any cardio just weights and I was tugging them up constantly. It wasn't enough to keep me from wearing them again though. They are just that comfortable and I'm in love with the black multi pattern. I wouldn't rebuy this style in this fabric again.
column9: SAN FRANCISCO BAY AREA, CA, USA

column6: This was my first pair of Lulu tights. I absolutely love the Peony print and the feel of these tights against my skin. These tights fit when I tried them on in the store. They no longer fit after having worn them once. It is a constant battle to keep these tights up. I could never work out in them. I hope that I am still able to return these.
column11: I KEEP MY AGE ON THE D.L.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Runner64,\nThanks for connecting with us. We stand behind the quality of our gear and want to make sure it's performing well for you. We'll be in touch via email to follow up and help.", 'LL_response_date': 'December 29, 2017'}

column6: I just got these pants for Christmas and though they feel amazing the fit is horrible. For these to be $128 I'd at least expect them to be able to stay up. Every 5 seconds I was pulling them up. I even gave them a couple tries with different workouts and they still fall down. I bought my regular size and even if I sized down they still would fall due to the material. Not worth the money if they don't stay up. Very comfortable though. I have several clothes from here and they all are great EXCEPT for these pants.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey FitChick26,\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear of the retention issues you're experiencing with your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight. I'd love to learn more so I can lend a hand with some solutions—please keep your eyes out for a follow up email headed your way shortly.", 'LL_response_date': 'December 28, 2017'}

column6: I bought these pants in August and have meant to return them, but I haven't had the time. I first tried these pants on and they were so comfortable. I walked around in them and they were the comfiest things ever. Since they fit so well, I decided to keep them and wash them. After the first wash, I went to go workout in them, and they did not fit AT ALL. I tried to run for 30 seconds, but I couldn't because they would just fall down. I went with my usual size, but these were just too big. I would still like to return them if possible because they were not worth $120 at all. I do not recommend these pants to anyone. If someone could get in touch with me about returning the pants after I wore them, that would be great.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey banana789,\nThanks for connecting with us. I'm so sorry to hear your Wunder Under Tight is not holding up for you. We stand by the quality of our gear and want to make sure it's performing well for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way with some solutions", 'LL_response_date': 'December 27, 2017'}

column6:
I am not sure why everyone hates these pants?? I bought two pairs and I love them!
They are so comfortable but I would recommend going down one size since the compression is not there (naked sensation) and the fit is obviously not the same as the hugged sensation leggings.
I have done yoga , barre, dance and run in these pants and they do not fall down.

I’ve been a loyal Lulu can’t for almost a decade so I can attest that I’ve tried a variety styles. I’ve never hated a pair more than these. At first they like a dream but the minute you’re confident and pop the tags off...boom these frigging pants won’t stay up. It’s pretty bad if I have to use my hand to hold them up while walking around in the gym. I thank my lucky stars that it was chest day and not squats because these certainly would have been on the ground while working out. Stay away!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Chloecho,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts with us today. We stand behind the quality of our gear and will be following up with some solutions via email.', 'LL_response_date': 'December 13, 2017'}

column6: I love Nulux, I thought I was grabbing the fast and free tight that has a drawstring, but I was in a rush. These fall down when I'm just walking to the car. Disappointed and they will end up in the bottom of my drawer, but they cant be returned since I wore them. No pockets for working out that, but that would just pull them down more if I added weight. Bummed, super cute print.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Mello03,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts with us today. We stand behind the quality of our gear and will be following up with some solutions via email.', 'LL_response_date': 'December 13, 2017'}

column5: Nice print but they slid down, Nulux fabric does not work for me. :(
column6:
I am a big fun of Lulu's leggings because of the quality and comfort but for the first time I am disappointed, I bought 7 leggings in my last visit to the store everything fits fine except the 2 pants made from Nulux fabric (this style and theFast & Free as soon as I started moving they slid down, I cant even walk with them because they started sliding down I had to pull them up with every step SO UNCOMFORTABLE!!!
Just to clarify, they are no too big, they fit perfectly. They just slide down as soon as I start moving.

I got this pant in Peony Multi and I love the print, they are super pretty! However, I tried working out in these pants and they kept sliding down, very frustrating.
I bought these pants specifically to workout in, but that's not gonna happen.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi GoldenGirl1,\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback. We would love to get a bit more information on your experience, and look into some options. An email is headed your way, so keep an eye out.', 'LL_response_date': 'December 7, 2017'}

column5: The worst yoga pants I have ever purchased
column6: Thankfully, I chose to walk my dog before going to yoga, as these pants slid down to my knees about a block away from home. Literally. I had to complete my walk holding my pants up with one hand. That was fun. I shudder to think what would have happened had I chosen to go directly to yoga. Love the print, but I don't know how these even made it to the shelves of an actual store. "Yoga pants with zero compression, what a terrific idea!" I've never written a review before, but these were so shockingly terrible, I took the time to tell the world.
column15: the feeling of terror as my pants slid down
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey mercermercermercer,\nSorry to hear that your  Wunder Under Hi-Rise Tight *Nulux 28" isn\'t holding up as expected. Please feel free to give our GEC a call at 1.877.263.9300 to continue this conversation.', 'LL_response_date': 'December 6, 2017'}

column6: I wanted to love these. I love the design and I think they are beautiful pants. I am a fan of the naked sensation because I'm obsessed with Aligns but these did not work for me. I ordered my normal size 6 and although they fit, they were all wrong for me. They were naked to the point they were see thru and you could see my c-section scar thru the pants. Also when I went to bend over after trying them on they rolled down which is another no for me since I'm always bending during my workouts and just throughout the day. Even sitting these would roll down. I am sure they will be flattering on someone else, but definitely not for me.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey PiYo,\nThanks for connecting with us. I'm so sorry to hear your Wunder Under Hi-Rise Nulux are having issues with coverage and staying up. We stand by the quality of our gear and want to make sure it's performing well for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way with some solutions.", 'LL_response_date': 'December 4, 2017'}

column6: LOVE the print, hate the fit. I ordered my normal size 6 and was constantly pulling them up with even minimal activity. Of course I can't return now that the tag is off, and am afraid to order a size 4 because you really need to wear them once to see. So disappointed for such an expensive pant. Don't waste your money!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey happyvalley,\nOh dear. Thanks for taking the time to share this feedback with us- we always want to ensure that our gear is performing for you as intended, and will be sending you an email so we can chat further.', 'LL_response_date': 'November 29, 2017'}

column6: These leggings are amazing!! The color selections are stunning and the feel is awesome! Just ordered my fourth pair! These are so comfy, true to size, probably my favorite leggings that Lululemon sells! Please make more products with Nulux!! Keep up the amazing work Lulu team!

Super comfortable, feels like a second skin. You will need to get a size down as they do run big. I weight train and do cardio/stair climber and I have not had any issues with these tights falling down. I would recommend these tights to anyone. However, if you wear a size 2 in lulus already I would suggest you try them on in the store before purchasing these beauties as they may not fit to your liking.
column15: a little see through (not noticeable to others)

column6: These leggings are just awful quality. The fabric is very thin and definitely see through. I tried on my TTS 4 and they actually were loose. The size 2 wasn't much better. There is zero compression, and the fit isn't flattering. These would definitely fall down once you started moving around in them. It's a shame because the print is awesome.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Traysea,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts today. We stand behind the quality of our gear and will be in touch shortly via email to follow up and help—chat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'November 26, 2017'}

column6:
I have three pair of the Wunder Under pants in luon and LOVE them! The pattern on these is great (mine are black and white), and they fit wonderfully, however, the as soon as I started moving they slid down. I wore them to a spin class and as soon as we started pedaling the pants started sliding down. I had to stop several times during the class to pull them up. I also did a 30 minute yoga routine in them and same issue (I cut it short because of the pants). I will probably use these for running, since hiking up pants while running is much easier than wiggling around on a bike seat but they are definite no-gos for biking or yoga.
Just to clarify, they are no too big, they fit perfectly. They just slide down as soon as I start any intense movement.

column5: Soooooo dissapointed becuase I love these pants!
column6:
I purchased these Wunder Under Nuluxe pants in-store and absolutely loved the naked-feel, the fit and the pattern and color. I have at least 10 pairs of Wunder Under pants in both high and low rise and am in love with all of them!
These I CANNOT wear to the gym, to the yoga studio or even on walks and out shopping. They are so loose that they fall and bunch and I am constantly tugging them up. I have basically stopped wearing them after 2 wears. They are impossible to lift weights in (what I usually wear my Lulu's for) and impossible to walk my dogs with or around town as I am tugging them up every couple of minutes.
They are so thin that I think the compression lacks and will not stay put. I likely should have gone with a size smaller but based on this material, I am not even sure that would have helped.
I LOVE these pants until I have them on :(

These pants are amazing. Super soft and the high waist stays put for barre, yoga and running. Did I say they were soft?? I recommend sizing down, though, as I think they run a bit big. Beautiful print; you will not regret buying these.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Npiroli,\nWe stand behind the quality of our gear and would love to look into a resolution for you. Please give our GEC a call at 1.877.263.9300—we'd love to make this right.", 'LL_response_date': 'December 16, 2017'}
